overview:
Excellence in the ability to increase monthly income.

Agron Ala, is an individual with a frame of mind that would make another person think “who is this guy.” Agron Ala runs a number of physical businesses (not-online-related) and then some online businesses.

Born on May 2nd, 1991 he made his first Hundred Thousandth dollar in Freshman year High School from a website offering virtual services and built his own multi-million dollar home in 2010.

He owns businesses from membership websites on weight-loss or social interactions to transportation companies, advertising companies, manufacturing companies of hospital equipment. Started his own solar farm in Europe, and has even started a private school, “Abstract Schools,” offering courses from guaranteed-memory-improvement (enough to remember entire books with great speed) to those for the elite.

Agron Ala, is just…increasing his monthly income to such an extent and from soo many mediums that people don’t even know him, unless they have met him.

milestones.description: Agron Ala, founds a new private school, the "Abstract Schools Organization"
